item.title: Former GOP senator John Sununu announces bid for old seat in New Hampshire
item.description: Sununu is aiming to replace retiring Sen. Jeanne Shaheen in a race in which his party hopes to replace a Democrat with a Republican.

item.title: How Obama maneuvered behind the scenes to fight Trump on redistricting
item.description: The ex-president’s involvement reflects the deep anxieties he has about Trump’s agenda and has propelled him into a more political, public-facing role...

item.title: University of Virginia nears deal with Trump officials to end investigations
item.description: The talks come months after University of Virginia President James E. Ryan resigned amid pressure from the Justice Department.

item.title: Shooting by ICE officer in Los Angeles wounds motorist, U.S. marshal
item.description: Federal authorities said the driver had threatened officers with a vehicle while trying to flee an arrest.

item.title: Maine Senate hopeful says he’ll remove tattoo ex-aide calls anti-Semitic
item.description: A Jewish civil rights group said the tattoo resembled a Nazi symbol. ‘I have legitimately dedicated much of my life to antifascism,’ Democrat Graham P...
